actions.name: Delta Stream

cost.trigger: At the start of combat, when switched in, or when the user gains this ability.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat, when switched in, or when the user gains this ability.
Effect: The Weather is changed to Intense Winds. When the user faints or switches out the weather will change to Windy for 5 rounds.

system.description:
